japanese: 青い空！　白い砂浜！
translation: Blue sky! The white sandy beach!

japanese: エメラルドグリーンの海！
translation: The emerald green sea!

japanese: これぞ沖縄だあっ！！
translation: This is Okinawa!!

japanese: テンション高……。
translation: Futaro's so excited...

japanese:
仕方ないでしょ。
目の前は最高の景色で、
彼女との仲も、とーっても順調なわけだし？
translation:
Well, it can't be helped, right?
With such an amazing view in front of us,
and his relationship going soooo well, right?

japanese:
……二乃。
そういうのは聞こえないところでお願いします。
translation:
...Nino.
Could you please keep those kinds of comments
to yourself?

japanese:
フータロー君。
海もいいけど、彼女の水着姿の感想は？
translation:
Futaro-kun,
how about your thoughts on your girlfriend's swimsuit?

japanese: い、い、一花！？
translation: I-I-Ichika?!

japanese: いや、その……。
translation: Well, um...

japanese: ……なにこれ。
translation: ...What's that?

japanese:
素直な感想でいいんだよ？
ほら！
translation:
Just give an honest opinion.
Come on!

japanese: あー……似合ってるぞ。
translation: Ah... It looks great on you.

japanese: ありがとうございます……。
translation: Thank you...

japanese: もう一声！
translation: Encore!

japanese: もういいです！　充分ですから～！
translation: That's enough! It's fine, really!

japanese: お前らなぁ、俺たちで遊んでるだろ。
translation: You guys are messing with us, right?

japanese: あら、このくらいはいいでしょ？
translation: Oh, come on, this is harmless fun, isn't it?

japanese:
さーて！　なにをしましょうか？
泳ぐでもいいし、アクティビティに挑戦も
ありですよ！
translation:
Now then, what should we do?
We could swim or try some activities!

japanese:
なあ。
やりたいことがあるんだが、いいか？
translation: Hey, I have something I want to do, is that okay?

japanese:
はい！
上杉さん、どうぞ！
translation:
Sure!
Go ahead, Uesugi-san!

japanese:
（下調べはしておいたんだ。
　ここのアクティビティにはあれがあるはず！）
translation:
(I did some research beforehand.
 There should be that kinda activity available here!)

japanese: シュノーケリングだ。
translation: Snorkeling.

japanese:
シュノーケリング！
いいですね！
translation:
Snorkeling!
Sounds great!

japanese:
本当はダイビングがいいんだが、
初心者がいきなりは難しそうだしな。
translation:
I actually wanted to go scuba diving, but
it seems too difficult for beginners.

japanese: へーえ、フータロー君にしてはアクティブだね。
translation: Wow, Futaro-kun, you're pretty active.

japanese:
べ、別にいいだろ。
確かに俺はインドア派だが、
せっかく沖縄に来てるんだ。
translation:
W-well, it's not a big deal.
I may be more of an indoor person, but
we're in Okinawa now, aren't we?

japanese:
いいんじゃないかな。
海の中を見るのは楽しそう。
translation:
I think it sounds like a lot of fun
to explore under the sea.

japanese: 私ももちろん賛成です。
translation: I'm in agreement too.

japanese: 私も！
translation: Me too!

japanese:
じゃ、決まりでいいわね。
あっちで受付してるみたいだから行きましょ。
translation:
Alright then, it's decided.
It looks like the registration
is over there, so let's go.

japanese: おう。
translation: Yeah.

japanese: あの、上杉君？
translation: Um, Uesugi-kun?

japanese: なんだ？
translation: What is it?

japanese:
いまの提案、もしかして、
私がウミガメと泳ぎたいと言ったから……。
translation:
Could it be that your suggestion now
is because I said
I wanted to swim with sea turtles...

japanese:
……まあ、そういうことだ。
プロジェクションマッピングの時も
そんな感じだっただろ？
translation:
Well... I guess that's it.
It was the same when we did projection mapping,
wasn't it?

japanese:
いまの提案、もしかして
プロジェクションマッピングの時の……。
translation:
Could it be that your suggestion now
is related to the time we saw the projection mapping...?

japanese:
あー、まあ、そうだ。
海の生き物と泳ぎたいって顔してたからな。
translation:
Ah, yeah, that's right.
You had a look on your face
like you wanted to swim with sea creatures.

japanese:
やっぱり……。
本当にあなたは……。
translation:
I knew it...
You really are...

japanese: あー！　それ以上言わなくていい！
translation: Ahh! You don't have to say anymore!

japanese:
（変に顔を赤くしてたら、
　ますますあいつらにからかわれる！）
translation:
(If I blush too much,
 they'll make fun of me even more!)

japanese:
では、一言だけ。
ありがとうございます
translation:
Well then, just one thing.
Thank you so much.

japanese: ……おう。
translation: ...No prob.

japanese:
（おお……。
　サンゴを間近で見たのは初めてだ！）
translation:
(Oh...
 It's my first time seeing coral up close!)

japanese:
（てか、魚ってこんなにたくさん、
　しかも近くを泳いでるもんなんだな。
　人に慣れてるのか？）
translation:
(And there are so many fish swimming close by us!
 Are they used to people?)

japanese:
（お？　五月に魚が集まってる。
　はは、ビックリした顔してんな）
translation:
(Oh! The fish are gathering by Itsuki.
 Haha, she looks surprised.)

japanese:
（笑ってる……。
　嬉しそうだな、
　シュノーケリングを提案したかいもある）
translation:
(She's smiling...
 She seems so happy.
 Maybe suggesting snorkeling was worth it.)

japanese: （こんなに嬉しそうな五月を見てると、俺も――）
translation: (Seeing Itsuki so happy like this, I%p-2;――%p;)

japanese: （って、俺、魚より五月を見てばっかじゃねぇか！）
translation:
(Hold on, am I just staring at Itsuki
 instead of the fish?!)

japanese: （……まあ、それもいいか）
translation: (...Well, that's okay, too.)

japanese:
シュノーケリング、楽しかったぁ！
海の中ってあんなに綺麗なんだね。
translation:
Snorkeling was so much fun!
The underwater world is so beautiful.

japanese: ええ、想像以上だったわ。
translation: Yes, it was beyond imagination.

japanese:
水の透明度がすごかった。
ずっと遠くまで見えたし。
translation:
The water was so clear,
I could see far into the distance.

japanese:
なにより、魚と戯れられたのに感激しました。
まさか向こうから寄ってきてくれるなんて！
translation:
Most of all, I was so moved
that I got to play with the fish.
I never thought they would swim up to me like that!

japanese: だな、あんなに人懐っこいものなのかって驚いたぜ。
translation: Yeah, I was surprised to see how friendly they were.

japanese:
ええ、私もです！
まるで歓迎してくれているようでしたね。
translation: Yes, me too! It felt like they were welcoming us.

japanese:
光輝く海の中、色とりどりの魚に囲まれて……
私、あの光景をずっと忘れません。
translation:
Surrounded by colorful fish in the shining sea...
I'll never forget that sight.

japanese:
しかし、さすがにウミガメとは会えなかったな。
ほんの少し期待してたんだが。
translation:
However, we couldn't meet any sea turtles, huh.
I had my hopes up, just a little bit.

japanese: ウミガメですか？
translation: Sea turtles?

japanese:
ああ、五月が前に
ウミガメと泳ぎたいって言ってたんだよ。
translation:
Yeah, Itsuki said before
that she wanted to swim with sea turtles.

japanese: ああ、それで……。
translation: Ahh, so...

japanese:
ウミガメは次の機会ですね。
ダイビングの資格を取るくらいの気合いで
挑むことにします。
translation:
The sea turtles will have to wait till next time.
I'll proceed with earnest determination
to get my diving certification.

japanese:
ねえ、これからどうする？
私、少し疲れちゃったから休憩したい。
translation:
Hey, so what are we going to do now?
I'm a little tired and want to take a break.

japanese:
ああ、そうだな。
じゃあ休憩ってことで、しばらく自由行動にするか。
translation:
Yeah, all right. Then let's take it easy
and have some free time for a while.

japanese: わかりました、そうしましょう。
translation: Got it, let's do that.

japanese:
満足したみたいで良かったぜ。
提案した甲斐もある。
translation:
I'm glad you seem satisfied.
It was worth proposing it.

japanese: ええ、沖縄でやりたいことの１つでしたから。
translation:
Yes, it was one of the things
I wanted to do in Okinawa.

japanese: そうなの？
translation: Really?

japanese: ああ、海の生き物と泳ぎたがってたんだよ。
translation: Yeah, she wanted to swim with sea creatures in the ocean.

japanese: そっか、それで……。
translation: I see, so...

japanese:
ねえ、これからどうする？
私、少し疲れちゃったから休憩したい。
translation:
Hey, so what are we going to do now?
I'm a little tired and want to take a break.

japanese:
ああ、そうだな。
じゃあ休憩ってことで、しばらく自由行動にするか。
translation:
Yeah, all right. Then let's take it easy
and have some free time for a while.

japanese: わかりました、そうしましょう。
translation: Got it, let's do that.
